title: Supercomputer simulations shed light on how liquid drops combine

title_detail.value: Supercomputer simulations shed light on how liquid drops combine

summary: High performance computing has revealed in detail how liquid droplets combine, in a development with applications such as improving 3D printing technologies or the forecasting of thunderstorms.

summary_detail.value: High performance computing has revealed in detail how liquid droplets combine, in a development with applications such as improving 3D printing technologies or the forecasting of thunderstorms.
